concepts.SUSPECTED_HSIL_WITH_SCJ_NOT_FULLY_VISUAL: Suspected HSIL with SCJ not fully visualized
concepts.LESION_EXTENDING_INTO_THE_ENDOCERVICAL_C: Lesion extending into the endocervical canal
concepts.SUSPECTED_HSIL_WITH_LESION_EXTENDING_INT: Suspected HSIL with lesion extending into cervical canal
concepts.LP,_INFORMED_CONSENT_6_DESC: Risk of procedure and alternatives have been explained to the patient, and the patient has signed the LEEP consent form
concepts.IBUPROFEN_400_MG_TID_FOR_THREE_DAYS_26: Ibuprofen 400 mg tid for three days
concepts.SUSPECTED_HSIL_WITH_LESION_>_75_PERCENTA: Suspected HSIL with lesion > 75% of cervical surface
concepts.LP,_ENDOCERVICAL_CURETTAGE,_YES,_SPECIME: Endocervical curettage, Yes, Specimen marked at 12 o'clock (suture)
